text: František Čuba (23 January 1936 – 28 June 2019) was a Czech agronomist and politician. He served as a member of the Czech Senate from 2014 to 2018. In 2013, he was honoured with the Medal of Merit by President Miloš Zeman. Čuba was born in Březová. He died on 28 June 2019, at the age of 83. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Czech politicians
title: František Čuba
